scripts.lerna:publish: yarn run prepublishOnly && npx lerna publish
scripts.lerna:publish:yes: yarn run prepublishOnly && npx lerna publish --yes --cd-version patch
scripts.postpublish:subtree:cjk-conv: git subtree push cjk-conv master --prefix packages/cjk-conv
scripts.postpublish:subtree:regexp-cjk: git subtree push regexp-cjk master --prefix packages/regexp-cjk
scripts.ncu: npx yarn-tool ncu -u && npx yarn-tool ws exec yarn-tool ncu -- -u
scripts.sort-package-json: npx yarn-tool sort && npx yarn-tool ws exec yarn-tool sort
